name: Leventhal Map & Education Center Collections (Boston Public Library)
description: Digital catalog of over a quarter million cartographic and geographic objects including maps, atlases, charts, globes, gazetteers, ephemera, research texts, and data sets, from the 15th century to present, covering world regions with particular strength in Boston, Massachusetts, and New England, available for online viewing and research.
owner_name: Norman B. Leventhal Map & Education Center at the Boston Public Library
